bug.author: skyzhao3q
bug.description: When I run Digits in cpu mode to do the tutorial of kitti-data, I got this Error Message below: ERROR: Check failed: error == cudaSuccess (29 vs. 0) driver shutting down It seems the model has been trained and it worked too. What does the Error Message mean ? PS: cuda-version is 8.0

comments.comment: I think it's a Caffe bug - something in a destructor somewhere. Feel free to open a bug over at NVIDIA/caffe if it's a problem.
